attorneys.attorney_name: Mary L Fuhr Rock Island Arsenal

charges.charge_description: 18:13-7220.M TRAFFIC OFFENSES, OTHER On or about [7/3/2011], in the CDIL, the Dft drove a motor vehicle upon the Rock Island Arsenal, while her privileges to operate a motor vehicle were suspended in Illinois, in violation of 625 ILCS 5/6-303(a) and 18 USC 13. (1)

18:13-7220.M TRAFFIC OFFENSES, OTHER On or about [7/3/2011], in the CDIL, the Dft drove a motor vehicle upon the Rock Island Arsenal, while her vehicle registration was suspended due to not having mandatory insurance coverage in Iowa, in violation of 625 ILCS 5/6-303(a) and 18 USC 13. (2)

18:13-7220.M TRAFFIC OFFENSES, OTHER On or about [7/3/2011], in the CDIL, the Dft drove a motor vehicle upon the Rock Island Arsenal, while traveling in excess of the posted speed limit of 25 mph, in violation of 625 ILCS 5/11-601(b) and 18 USC 13. (3)
